DOC.brief_title: A Study Measuring Asthma Control In Pediatric And Adolescent Subjects Whose Asthma Is Worsened By Activity Or Exercise
DOC.mesh_term: Fluticasone Propionate , Salmeterol Xinafoate Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Diagnosed persistent asthma 3 month longer . Experienced worsen asthma symptoms physical activity . Using inhaled steroid previous 4 week longer ( Aerobid , Azmacort , Flovent , Pulmicort , QVAR , Vanceril ) . Exclusion criterion : Used systemic steroid either liquid , pill , injection treat asthma within previous 3 month . Have intermittent , seasonal , exerciseinduced asthma , persistent asthma . Admitted hospital within previous 6 month due asthma symptom . Any poorly control medical condition may make study participation unsafe inappropriate opinion study physician ( cystic fibrosis , congenital heart disease , insulin dependent diabetes , glaucoma , drug allergy , etc . ) The study physician evaluate medical criterion .
